item.title: The Israel-Hamas war's devastating human toll after 2 years, by the numbers
item.description: Tuesday marks two years since the Israel-Hamas war began, bringing devastation across the region.

item.title: Texas National Guard headed to Illinois, as Pritzker decries 'authoritarian march'
item.description: It was not immediately clear when the Guardsmen would arrive in Chicago.

item.description: The hearing follows a tumultuous summer for the Department of Justice.

item.title: WATCH: Near-supermoon lights up American skies
item.description: Time-lapse imagery captured the nearly full moon, a forerunner to the harvest supermoon, rising and setting over U.S. cities.
